-- Auto-generated SQL test data script
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 0;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_karten;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_ueberweisungen;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_besitz;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_mitarbeiter;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_kunden;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mm_filiale;
SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

-- Create tables
CREATE TABLE mm_filiale (
    FNr     INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name    TEXT,
    adresse TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mm_kunden (
    kontostand INT,
    kontotyp   TEXT,
    kontoNr    INT PRIMARY KEY,
    FNr        INT,
    telefon    VARCHAR(30),
    adresse    TEXT,
    gebdatum   DATE,
    name       TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (FNr) REFERENCES mm_filiale(FNr)
);


-- Insert test data
INSERT INTO mm_filiale (FNr, name, adresse) VALUES
